#{portIo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDR_FLG = #{idrFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDR_MODE = #{idrMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDR_AVAILABLE = #{idrAvailable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGV_FLG = #{mgvFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_MODE_AUTO_CHG_FLG = #{inOutModeAutoChgFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_OUT_MODE_CHG_TIMER = #{inOutModeChgTimer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IN_OUT_MODE_SET_TIME = #{inOutModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TSC_ID = #{tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUMMY_FLG = #{dummyFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OHB_PORT_ID = #{ohbPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OHB_SEARCH_COUNT = #{ohbSearchCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REJECT_PORT_ID = #{defaultDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOST_PORT_TYPE = #{hostPortType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_PORT_MODE = #{hShowPortMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_SET_TIME = #{hShowSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_ID = #{eqpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_PORT_ID = #{eqpPortId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BLOCK_REQ_FLG = #{blockReqFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_ID_READ_FLG = #{vehicleIdReadFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICKUP_ERROR_COUNT = #{pickupErrorCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BATCH_WAIT_TM = #{batchWaitTm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMP_TIME = #{compTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PORT_ID = #{portId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT p.port_id, p.tsc_id, NVL(a.alarm_text, '-') alarm_text, p.available, p.ibsem_avail, p.port_mode, NVL(c.carrier_id, ' ') carrier_id FROM ( SELECT port_id, tsc_id, available, ibsem_avail, port_mode FROM port UNION SELECT ohb_port_id port_id, tsc_id, available, ibsem_avail, ohb_port_mode port_mode FROM ohb_port ) p LEFT OUTER JOIN alarm a ON p.port_id = a.alarm_loc LEFT OUTER JOIN carrier c ON p.port_id = c.current_loc WHERE (a.alarm_text IS NOT NULL OR ( p.available <> 'Available' OR p.ibsem_avail <> 'Available' OR p.port_mode <> 'Up' )) ORDER BY tsc_id, port_id

SELECT p.port_id, p.tsc_id, '' alarm_text, p.available, p.ibsem_avail, p.port_mode, NVL(c.carrier_id, ' ') carrier_id FROM (SELECT port_id, tsc_id, available, ibsem_avail, port_mode FROM port UNION SELECT ohb_port_id port_id, tsc_id, available, ibsem_avail, ohb_port_mode port_mode FROM ohb_port) p LEFT OUTER JOIN carrier c ON p.port_id = c.current_loc WHERE (p.available <> 'Available' OR p.ibsem_avail <> 'Available' OR p.port_mode <> 'Up') AND (tsc_id = #{tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR (p.port_id IN (SELECT ohb_port_id FROM ohb_port WHERE set_vendor IN( SELECT llc_id FROM tsc WHERE tsc_id = #{tscId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})))) ORDER BY tsc_id,port_id
